column4: Does anybody know what the gnome-pty-helper process does? The longer I leave my computer on, the more the number of these processes seem to crop up.
check the serpentine package
i think this is the nautilus embeded burner
try doing "dpkg --list | grep libltdl"
I have a package installed on my machine by that name
thanks :)
np :-)
how can i get an update of that file? "libltdl.so.1" this is the one i have but i need number 3 "libltdl.so.3" :(
I am really not sure. If it is not uptodate in the repositories, you might need to manually download it, and probably compile from source or something like that.
thanks, then i continue searching :)
Hang on, my machine has libltdl.so.3.1.0
Are you sure you are running the most up to date system?
what did dpkg --list | grep libltdl3 return?
:( nothing
In my machine, it said the package name is libltdl3. I then did "dpkg --listfiles libltdl3"
probably you could do "sudo apt-cache search libltdl3"
it returned me two lines, with info
Don't paste here, paste on some pasteboard or something. And send me the URL ..
i think i can do sudo apt-get install those packages? one is the package and second is the -dev :)
that would be great. Yes, you can install them using apt-get
Yay ! Good for you ..
